body:
Hey guys I've been struggling a bit with my trust in people and just thinking the world is a completely corrupt and vile place but then I found this channel and it really helped to remind me that not everyone is bad and that there is still plenty of good people out there I suggest you check it out.

Link: https://m.youtube.com/user/GiveBackFilms

title: Faith in humanity
